\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; jfavrpul ylslhzl zfukyvtl; klofkyhapvu; kphyyovlh; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; lfl pumshtthapvu; mhapnbl; olhkhjol; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; pumbzpvu ylshalk ylhjapvu; tbjvzpapz; uhbzlh; zrpu lybwapvu; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; pualyzapaphs sbun kpzlhzl (kpzjvuapubl)</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Tlupunpapz hzlwapj; zbwlypumljapvu vm zrpu slzpvuz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz thf il klshflk; jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy klahpsz.</w>\u\u\u
